title: Gmail Not working anymore
creator: greenda4
content:
Hi,

Today I installed Thunderbird to backup my Gmail account because I am getting warnings that my gmail account is running out of space. Everything seemed to work flawlessly. Until several hours later when checking my Gmail on my phone, I realized that I had not received any messages, which is odd. Then when I got home, I see on my laptop that Thunderbird had been receiving my gmails just fine. How do I get both Gmail and Thunderbird to receive new messages as I am often away from my laptop and need to check my Gmail on my phone.

Thanks,

greenda4

title: Historic emails
creator: paulmetcalfe.7
content: I have used Thunderbird for several years to receive and send emails. My laptop crashed recently and I've had to have a new hard drive installed. I reinstalled Thunderbird successfully but for some reason my emails (from btinternet.com) only go back one month. How do I retrieve older emails? I normally keep at least twelve months to hand. Help much appreciated Paul

title: Erreur d’authentification. Connexion au serveur impossible. La configuration, l’identifiant ou le mot de passe sont probablement incorrects.
creator: etessier44
content: Hello, After replacing my PC (Windows 11), I reinstalled Thunderbird. I have 4 GMail accounts. For 3 of them, no problem. But for one, I have the error 'Authentication error. Connection to server is impossible. Configuration, identifier or password look incorrects'. I used default settings. This account is not particular. Issue remains after deleting this account, restarting Windows, and re-creating this account. I've created a new Windows user, then add this GMail account, and no problem. So what do you think of this? The only workaround for me is to switch between 2 Windows user. It's not useful. And I don't understand why this account, which is similar to others, has this issue. Thanks a lot for your answers.

title: IMAP display folder names wrong, Inbox translates correctly, but that about it. No manual change seems possible...
creator: jan278
content:
I am using Thunderbird with IMAP accounts and the Swedish language pack. My Inbox is correctly displayed as "Inkorgen", but other system folders like "Drafts" still show their English names instead of the Swedish ones (e.g. "Utkast").

In the folder properties dialog, it looks like there is a field for the display name separate from the server path, but I cannot edit it for system folders. For custom folders I can rename them, but not for Drafts, Sent, or Trash.

Is there a way to change only the display name of these system folders without altering the IMAP path? Or is this a limitation in Thunderbird's localization/mapping?

title: Issue with POP GMails Emails Downloading & getting deleted from Server
creator: pethiraj
content:
Hello Everyone,

Background: Using Thunderbird for almost an year and extremely happy with the product set. I use it to access GMAIL via POP and use the settings "After the email gets downloaded to my computer, delete the GMAIL copy" (Settings attached).

My usage pattern which changed recently: Earlier, I will always download emails using Thunderbird every day and it was working perfectly. Recently I have to travel for few days and during those days I will access my GMAIL via my android mobile primarily and I download all the emails after my return.

Current Issue: Now after I return, all the mails gets downloaded, but it does not get deleted at GMail side (online). From the time I started using Thunderbird after my return, the newer emails from that time are getting downloaded and deleted but the old emails stay in GMail. Current inconvenience is it takes time to validate if all the important emails are downloaded and I cleanup the GMAIL manually and then we are all in sync. This continues until my next travel. I tried resetting the GMAIL POP settings and there is no improvement.

Any pointers or suggestions to resolve will be gladly appreciated. Thanks in advance!
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/142.0.0.0 Safari/537.36;solver_id:7221908

content: Not receiving email from certain "institutions;" seems OK from individuals, but can't be sure. Use Outlook address as main "give out" address. title: Cannot Setup Thunderbird to Compose Emails using my Preferred Font Type and Font Color
creator: spsharma
content:
Hello,

I had been using Thunderbird as my email App for very long time. About a few years ago I stopped using it, due to some annoying errors.

I installed the new version a few days ago, however I am some issues:

1. I want to change the default email composing font type and font color. I made changes in the setting and config editor as well. When I start creating an email the font type and color shown is correct. However, as soon as I start typing the default takes over.

2. I have about 50, 000 emails, which I keep for references (ATT-Yahoo). Every evening all the messages disappear, except for about 2000. Then, in the mornings, I have to restart the app and it starts to download "AGAIN". Please advise.

Surendra

title: passwords
creator: Sharbo
content:
Hey Forum, 2 problems.

  1. 1. - I have been having some problems w/my paypal account. Someone has been trying to hack into it. Twice in two weeks. I talked to a paypal tech and was told that they are accessing my emails. And she advised changing my email password. I have use Tbird for several years and don't remember having a password. But if I do, where is it, and how do I change it?
  2. 2 - For awhile now I have been getting an error message when trying to send an email. (I can recieve, but not send). it says: "Enter your password for ***********@suddenlink.net on smtpsuddenlink.net" Where would I find such a password and where is smtpsuddenlink.net? Also could the above problem be related to this one? They started about the same time.
